description:
**Fix Overview**:

To resolve the Microsoft WDAC OLE DB Provider for SQL Server remote code execution vulnerability identified by CVE-2024-21391:

1. Ensure that you have installed the January 2024 updates for your Windows system. 
2. If you have already installed these updates, no further action is required. 
3. For users who need to manually verify or install the updates, download the relevant update packages from the official Microsoft Update Catalog links.

**Details**:
- This vulnerability could allow remote code execution if exploited, hence ensuring the updates are installed is crucial for system security.
- References can be found in the following KB articles corresponding to your Windows version:
  - Windows 11 Version 23H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - Windows 11 Version 22H2: [KB5034765](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034765)
  - Windows 10 Version 22H2: [KB5034763](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034763)

**Preconditions**:
- Confirm your system's version alignment with the correct KB Article prior to installation.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with any updates.
